caption.p: ( a– c) Seasonal Trend analysis and climate change velocity for Summer maximum temperature (Tmax) for the periods 1901–1950, 1901–2015 and 1951–2015, respectively, showing values of significance level p ≤ 0.05 (left panels: p ≤ 0.001 red, 0.001 < p ≤ 0.01 green and 0.01 < p ≤ 0.05 blue) and Sen’s slope (right panels). ( d) Climate change velocity for Summer maximum temperature (Tmax) for period 1951–2015.
